name: soccer-match-simulator-backend
description: Backend Lambda function for Soccer Match Simulator

scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r function.zip dist node_modules
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name soccer-match-simulator --zip-file fileb://function.zip
scripts.sam:invoke: sam local invoke MatchSimulatorFunction --event events/test-event.json --env-vars env.json
